pr_title: Added unique PathNotFoundExceptionMapper and mock test for that file

timeline.message:
Added unique PathNotFoundExceptionMapper and mock test for that file

Resolves https://jira.lyrasis.org/browse/FCREPO-3177

timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: Line 51 is checking that actual.getStatus() equals 404, so i don't think its possible for this line to ever receive 500, since line 51 would have failed in that case.
timeline.author: bbpennel

replies.bodyText: the check against INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR and the imports used for that check have been removed
replies.author: robyj

timeline.message:
Mockito file modified:
- space added after comma
- second error code vs Erro code 500 test removed
removed imports that made the travis build fail
